html:
4.1.21  12:06 pm   Have you ever considered/do you think you'll ever write a biography or something?  

      yes

4.1.21  11:27 am   Did you say "and the hourglass is twisting a little bit sideways" because then the sand would fall slower?

      this would represent time going in a strange direction

4.1.21  11:05 am   Does the song process go like, think of the song, then do the song?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.1.21  10:37 am   What's your April Fool joke this year?

      1st quarter earnings reports

4.1.21  10:02 am   how would you unflip a coin?

      pick it up and hold it in your hand tenderly

4.1.21  9:11 am   What's a sign that a person is entering hell?

      if everything seems fine

4.1.21  4:28 am   i'm a writer but i can only seem to write prose. whenever i try to write songs or anything with a verse structure like a poem i just have no ideas. any tips

      do you tend to enjoy songs

4.1.21  4:08 am   are we going to be ok?

      yes

4.1.21  4:03 am   what's a good reason for living/ existing?

      changing, staying the same, and changing between changing and staying the same

4.1.21  1:34 am   What's your favorite song/video you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

4.1.21  12:58 am   How do I convince myself that I will always be able to come up with more ideas

      i don't know, but it's true





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

3.31.21  11:18 pm   ever felt like we all have the same emotional sickness

      yes

3.31.21  10:30 pm   you ever get the urge to just waft around in a tonicless wholetoney mess and drift and swash and then maybe suggest like a 2 5 but then do it again a major third lower and then again and then again until you float out of tonal reality

      what typically happens, sort of like hanggliding, first i sort of launch away from tonal reality, and then glide on the wind as i'm naturally carried back to earth, sometimes in an interesting path

3.31.21  10:16 pm   What is your favorite flavor of water?

      wet blast

3.31.21  10:03 pm   whats your favorite song

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

3.31.21  9:19 pm   Is "i'm a princess" about space exploration?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.31.21  8:07 pm   when will your songs be on the radio??

      probably a couple weeks from now

3.31.21  8:03 pm   Ive not done anything creative before, what creative thing should i do

      how about wearing a name tag

3.31.21  7:50 pm   Does the meaning find the song or does the song find the meaning.

      can go both ways

3.31.21  5:07 pm   Should I eat plastic?

      no

3.31.21  4:10 pm   I HAVE SPENT SO MUCH TIME WITH MYSELF AND A WHITE PAGE KALEIDOSCOPING MY FEELINGS THAT I SPEAK IN METAPHORS AND NOBODY UNDERSTANDS HELP

      it's probably time to make your own website

3.31.21  3:53 pm   when selecting instruments for a new song, have you ever included updog?

      no but that could be exactly what i need right now

3.31.21  2:52 pm   is there no avoiding the painful process of listening to your own song 1000+ times during the production and mixing stages?

     you could finish it quicker

     should one even bother trying to lessen this pain or is powering through it the price one must pay for a good song

      sometimes it actually makes the song worse. but i'm working on a solution for this and when i do i will share it with the scientific community

3.31.21  2:36 pm   i always doubt my ability to make something good. how do you get past that and just let your ideas flow?

      an occasional miracle may occur

3.31.21  1:07 pm   Why are we all so cool 

      this is from the ability to change our minds, or keep it the same. or decide later whether to change it

3.31.21  12:53 pm   Are songs the best way do you think to communicate meaningful stuff?

     sometimes

     Like would you say it's better than conversation, movies, stories, poetry?

      you probably have to keep switching

3.31.21  12:17 pm   i don't have enough time to listen to enough music what should i do? i want to write songs and record things too

      how about doing a tireless rant

3.31.21  11:06 am   have you ever thought about doing a course teaching how you compose/make videos?

     yes, i'm doing it now for myself, so i can learn

     your style is pretty unique ;)

      it's also partially impossible, in many ways

3.31.21  10:01 am   I have a box of antique sheet music from the late 1800's and early 1900's that I saved from being thrown in the garbage when a local antique shop went out of business.

What should I do with it?

      scan it

3.31.21  8:57 am   whats the rarest in the universe?

      could be you

3.31.21  8:42 am   is "might quit" and "here comes the sun" are just a rickroll?

      no

3.31.21  8:23 am   4.10.18 9:51 pm Why not??

      i probably thought it would give the whole thing away. but i can tell you now the answer was "n"

3.31.21  8:10 am   Hey Bill, love the new song. Would you care to shed some insight on what you were thinking when making the ridiculous transition at 2:38? I don't understand the timing at all but it feels cool, all the best!

      there was a re-write. the "don't know" part (etc) is a replacement part for something different that used to be there. And so i had to make it connect to the part that came after (the regular chorus riff). so i pretty much did it the only reasonable way i could think of. This reminds me of what i ended up doing just before the 3rd chorus of the "la de da" song

3.31.21  7:37 am   how do i ask a question

      just tell the truth

3.31.21  6:45 am   Could it be possible that everything is possible? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

3.31.21  12:24 am   Doors seem to be a common object in the Bill Wurtz universe, is there any meaning behind them?

      seems like the whole world is behind them

3.30.21  11:12 pm   how is your new song going

     pretty good

     /have you strarted it yet

      yes

3.30.21  10:36 pm   why do you mention love on almost(probably all) songs that you make?

      this is part of a broader strategy of normalness, and normality, that i've been adhering to

3.30.21  6:56 pm   why are you so funny and inspiring at the same time

      i'm just trying to get by

3.30.21  6:49 pm   how do you get ideas for lyrics

      usually musically

3.30.21  5:53 pm   hey bill do you have any tips on existing? it seems really complicated and i wanted some pointers

      try making some maps

3.30.21  5:29 pm   hi bill, what is the time signature that you chose for the song "all I gotta do is"?

      changing it rampantly

3.30.21  5:00 pm   whats your personality type

      1000

3.30.21  5:00 pm   what makes an idea good?

      you're gonna have to do it

3.30.21  2:52 pm   How do you get that strong, solid bass without it becoming muddy or blurring the mix?

      this may not be a popular thing to talk about, but, sometimes one of the first steps is to politely convince the piano player in the band to put their left hand behind their back

3.30.21  2:24 pm   How can I improve the quality of my vocals?

      this might not be what you expect, but, have you tried improvising the lyrics

3.30.21  2:02 pm   how to be good at musicing?

      start with 2 different sounds/notes. your first challenge is to tell a story using only those 2 notes

3.30.21  1:58 pm   Is {objects} a programming joke?

      no

3.30.21  12:42 pm   What do you do if have the inspiration, but you don't the tools to wield it?

      try using something that you didn't think was a tool

3.30.21  11:16 am   What side of a mirror are you on?

      the front
